oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SEDIMENT LOAD UNDER WAVES AND CURRENTS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Willis, D.H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sediment load
current
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A technique is proposed for calculating sediment load, the mass concentration of sediment in motion, under combinations of waves and currents. The technique is based on the unidirectional flow method of Ackers and White, Ref. 1. The calibration of the technique against measurements of sediment load under waves has only just begun.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 16 (1978): Proceedings of 16th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Hamburg, Germany, 1978.; 97
